Package edu.ncsu.csc316.trail.manager

Class TrailManager

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc316.trail.manager.TrailManager
public class TrailManager extends Object
This is the TrailManager which allows for the user to determine how far they are from destinations based on an input origin, get landmarks by their name, and determine the best first aid locations based on the number of intersecting trails a landmark has.
Author:
Mukul Sauhta

    Description
    TrailManager(String pathToLandmarkFile, String pathToTrailFile)
    This is the constructor for the TrailManager, which requires an input path to the landmark file, and input path to the trail file.

    Description
    edu.ncsu.csc316.dsa.map.Map<edu.ncsu.csc316.trail.data.Landmark,Integer>
    getDistancesToDestinations(String originLandmark)
    This method gets the distances to the destinations from a specific landmark by fetching it using its ID, and then determining the distance between all possible trails that it can access from that point.

    getLandmarkByID(String landmarkID)
    This method allows for the landmark to be fetched given its ID.
    edu.ncsu.csc316.dsa.map.Map<edu.ncsu.csc316.trail.data.Landmark,edu.ncsu.csc316.dsa.list.List<edu.ncsu.csc316.trail.data.Trail>>
    getProposedFirstAidLocations(int numberOfIntersectingTrails)
    This method gets the proposed first aid locations given a minimum number of intersecting trails on the landmark necessary to be a first aid location, and then returns a map of all the landmarks (key) which has the minimum # of intersecting trails (value).

  • Constructor Details

    • TrailManager

      public TrailManager(String pathToLandmarkFile, String pathToTrailFile) throws FileNotFoundException
      This is the constructor for the TrailManager, which requires an input path to the landmark file, and input path to the trail file.
      Parameters:
      pathToLandmarkFile - the file containing landmarks.
      pathToTrailFile - the file containing trails.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if there is no file found on either parameter.

  • Method Details

    • getDistancesToDestinations

      public edu.ncsu.csc316.dsa.map.Map<edu.ncsu.csc316.trail.data.Landmark,Integer> getDistancesToDestinations(String originLandmark)
      This method gets the distances to the destinations from a specific landmark by fetching it using its ID, and then determining the distance between all possible trails that it can access from that point.
      Parameters:
      originLandmark - the origin we start from.
      Returns:
      a map of all the landmarks which are accessible from the origin, followed by their distance from the origin.

    • getLandmarkByID

      public edu.ncsu.csc316.trail.data.Landmark getLandmarkByID(String landmarkID)
      This method allows for the landmark to be fetched given its ID.
      Parameters:
      landmarkID - the ID of the landmark that the method fetches.
      Returns:
      The landmark based on the ID parameter.

    • getProposedFirstAidLocations

      public edu.ncsu.csc316.dsa.map.Map<edu.ncsu.csc316.trail.data.Landmark,edu.ncsu.csc316.dsa.list.List<edu.ncsu.csc316.trail.data.Trail>> getProposedFirstAidLocations(int numberOfIntersectingTrails)
      This method gets the proposed first aid locations given a minimum number of intersecting trails on the landmark necessary to be a first aid location, and then returns a map of all the landmarks (key) which has the minimum # of intersecting trails (value).
      Parameters:
      numberOfIntersectingTrails - the minimum number of intersecting trails the user inputs or a proposed first aid location.
      Returns:
      the map of all landmarks that can be a proposed first aid location.
